title: [Samsung Pay 分享友賞會員推薦]

replies.msg:
[Samsung Pay 分享友賞會員推薦] 由2018年10月30日起至12月31日，只要加入Smart Octopus於你新建立的Samsung Pay，並於以下活動連結輸入此推薦號碼，完成後可獲得HK$100八達通增值額獎賞。

現時支援Smart Octopus裝置: Samsung Galaxy Note9, Note8, S9, S9plus, S8, S8plus, A8 Star, A8plus, C9 Pro, C7 Pro and C5 Pro。
詳情請瀏覽: https://www.samsung.com/hk/samsungpay/memberreferral

推薦號碼: 11D6WH
活動連結: https://d3sfvyfh4b9elq.cloudfront.net/promo/promodata/redirect/samsungpay.html?eventURL=https%3A%2F%2Fus.mpay.samsung.com%2Fgpp%2Fmicrosite%2Fpromo%2Fprd_us%2F2385489448419207170%2Fapp%2Fv2%2Fview%2Ftemplate%2FType_Recommend%2Fes%2Fzh_Intro.html%3Ft%3Dprm

現時支援Smart Octopus裝置: Samsung Galaxy Note9, Note8, S9, S9plus, S8, S8plus, A8 Star, A8plus, C9 Pro, C7 Pro and C5 Pro。
詳情請瀏覽: https://www.samsung.com/hk/samsungpay/memberreferral
